name: Creamy Latte
description: A smooth and creamy blend of rich espresso and steamed milk, perfect for a comforting coffee break.

name: Caramel Macchiato
description: Espresso layered with steamed milk and topped with sweet caramel syrup for a rich and indulgent flavor.

name: Cappuccino
description: A balanced combination of espresso, steamed milk, and thick milk foam with a bold coffee taste.

name: Americano
description: A strong and bold coffee made by diluting espresso with hot water for a smooth, rich flavor.
